p: As mentioned above, the highest contributors to the “ozone layer depletion” category are the film 1, film 2, cutting and sealing while the contribution of general and waste pelletization is lower. This can be explained by the fact that some oil-delivered materials such as crude oil, gasoline and naphtha are used in the extrusion and printing processes, with a very strong and negative impact on the ozone layer, in addition to those processes that lead to extrusion and transformation [23].
